name: Pretty Boxy MetroidVania
description:
- Pretty Boxy MetroidVania -

As you teleport to a strange, plant based planet something goes wrong and you lose all your equipment. Find your weapons again and collect upgrade crystals hidden in the world to upgrade them to peak performance. Currently, there are two planets visitable, and a "hub ship" available from which you can travel to planets and upgrade your weapons. Can you find all 6 weapons and fully upgrade them? Hope you have fun!

My first 2D game and second "short game" project, implemented in unity.

- Gameplay -

Pretty straightforward metroidvania with shooting elements. Explore planets and find hidden upgrade crystals to improve your weapons. 

There are many different enemies to encounter and 6 weapons to find. Originally, 4 worlds where planet, which is why the second planet features a lot more weapons than the first. But due to time constraints with the "one game a month" approach those did not make it into this version. But they might be added at a later point still, as some mechanics were already implemented but are currently unused :)

- Controls -

WASD to move

MOUSE to move cursor

LEFT MOUSE to shoot weapon (once obtained)

SPACE to jump

SHIFT to dash (once obtained)

NUMBER KEYS to switch weapons

ESCAPE to pause game

R to reset to last checkpoint

- Credits -

Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
